Package org.jfree.chart.block

Interface Block

All Superinterfaces:
org.jfree.ui.Drawable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ContentBlock
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractContentBlock, ACITextTitle, AttributedLabelBlock, AttributedTextTitle, Axis, BlockContainer, CategoryAxis, CategoryAxis3D, CategoryPlot, CategoryPlotWrapper, ColorBlock, CombinedDomainCategoryPlot, CombinedDomainXYPlot, CombinedRangeCategoryPlot, CombinedRangeXYPlot, CompassPlot, CompositeTitle, ContourPlot, CyclicNumberAxis, DateAxis, DateTitle, EmptyBlock, ExtendedCategoryAxis, FastScatterPlot, ImageTitle, JFreeChart, LabelBlock, LegendGraphic, LegendTitle, LogarithmicAxis, MeterPlot, ModuloAxis, MultiplePiePlot, NestedGrid, NumberAxis, NumberAxis3D, PeriodAxis, PiePlot, PiePlot3D, Plot, PolarPlot, RingPlot, SpiderWebPlot, SubCategoryAxis, SymbolAxis, TextTitle, ThermometerPlot, Title, ValueAxis, WaferMapPlot, XYPlot, XYPlotWrapper
public interface Block extends org.jfree.ui.Drawable
A block is an arbitrary item that can be drawn (in Java2D space) within a rectangular area, has a preferred size, and can be arranged by an Arrangement manager.

  • Method Summary

  • Method Details

    • getID

      String getID()
      Returns an ID for the block.
      Returns:
      An ID.

    • setID

      void setID(String id)
      Sets the ID for the block.
      Parameters:
      id - the ID.

    • arrange

      org.jfree.ui.Size2D arrange(Graphics2D g2, ArrangeParams params)
      Deprecated.
      This doesn't provide a way to get messages out!!
      Arranges the contents of the block, with no constraints, and returns the block size. In general, the size returned by this method is the preferred size for the block.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      params - optional parameters.
      Returns:
      The size of the block.

    • arrange

      ArrangeResult arrange(Graphics2D g2, RectangleConstraint constraint, ArrangeParams params)
      Arranges the contents of the block, within the given constraints, and returns the block size.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      constraint - the constraint (null not permitted).
      params - the layout parameters (null not permitted).
      Returns:
      The block size (in Java2D units, never null).

    • getBounds

      Rectangle2D getBounds()
      Returns the current bounds of the block.
      Returns:
      The bounds.

    • setBounds

      void setBounds(Rectangle2D bounds)
      Sets the bounds of the block.
      Parameters:
      bounds - the bounds.

    • draw

      Object draw(Graphics2D g2, Rectangle2D area, Object params)
      Draws the block within the specified area. Refer to the documentation for the implementing class for information about the params and return value supported.
      Parameters:
      g2 - the graphics device.
      area - the area.
      params - optional parameters (null permitted).
      Returns:
      An optional return value (possibly null).
